input_args.passage: "Superman IV: The Quest for Peace (1987) | The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man. Rating: 3.7/10, \u200e51,461 votes"
input_args.claim: 'From this, it can be deduced that the actor who played Lex Luthor in "Superman IV: The Quest for Peace" is Gene Hackman.'
